nodes.bodyText: Any reason why you actually implement ZFile and override these?

Good point, you are right that we might not need to do so. The VsamFile will be refactored and abstract this away, so the storage be clean from ZFile api. There is a new task in the story for this.  Agreed to proceed to merge this, add tests and make the changes when api is under tests.
Have you considered moving this to configuration?
Will be solved on the subsequent refactor
